responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "C6C899034B2F867235A5EA90809921AA", "From what we can tell, they receive orders from within the citadel. Their leader rarely makes appearances outside the walls of the citadel, and instead sends more bandits to do his bidding. On the whole, the Forsaken Blade are a tactical group. They only leave their fortifications to steal supplies from the Kaelar shipments, especially those inbound to Halcyon from Sanctus.")
name: CSQ_RVR_0081_FB_NordenResnick_DLG_24
